'''Bob Richardson''' was a remote doctor who consulted on cases using a camera to see into hospital rooms.

==History==
As part of [[Alana Cahill|Alana Cahill's]] attempt to maximize the efficiency of the hospital, cameras were installed around the hospital. Behind the cameras were remote physicians who were there to consult on cases in order to reduce error.

When Bob questioned a decision Cristina made for a patient's treatment, she went into a room and told him not to interfere with the treatment of her patients.

He later stopped [[Leah Murphy]] from transfusing blood into [[Rich Campion]], a Jehovah's Witness.

==Career==
Bob Richardson works as a remote physician, using cameras to consult on cases and reduce error.
